Text: Does the above text mean there are Fixed Swedisn subtitles, or what?
It says that there is NO swedish subtitle... And if there WOULD be a swedish subtitle, it would be in a separate .srt file.

Thanks for the reply. Unfortutately the aspect ratio is wrong. The height is smaller than it should. This defect was already present in a previous torrent iploaded some months ago.

It is posible to view it correctly with NERO Showtime by setting the aspect ratio to 12:9. 

But if you want to convert to a DVD (MPEG-2) it may prove very hard. I will try some tools and if I succeed I'll report it here...
